metadata.title: CVE-2024-43426 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in pdfTeX. Insufficient sanitizing in the TeX notationfilter resulted in an arbitrary file read risk on sites where pdfTeX isavailable, such as those with TeX Live installed.

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
